Northern California’s Keely Cashman leads U.S. ski team in a line dance at Milan Cortina Olympics
Updated: 8:14 AM PST Feb 8, 2026
Editorial Standards ⓘ
Keely Cashman, 26, had a side gig as a dance instructor at the 2026 Milan Cortina Olympics.The Alpine skier from Strawberry in Tuolumne County gave an impromptu line dance lesson to her fellow downhill skiers from Team USA when fog delayed training. Cashman, Lindsey Vonn, Isabella Wright and Breezy Johnson were seen doing the dance in their ski boots. Watch the moment as it unfolded here. A video Cashman shared on Instagram had more than 10,000 likes. Cashman is a second-time Olympian after competing in 2022, and is also a barista at her family’s coffee shop in Pinecrest called the Serene Bean.
